dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Tell me your destination, and I’ll guide you there.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: There are many things I fail to comprehend, and those who are late to work are one of them. I believe timely arrival is a basic requirement for an employee to meet.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: I often expose myself to sunlight at this hour. It may be attributed to the fact that the nature of my occupation prevented me from seeing it frequently.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Few people enjoy conversing with me. That would make you a strange one, Manager.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: I am familiar with dead bodies. Familiarity does not assure pleasantness, however.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: Don Quixote says she is proud to have joined W Corp. I found that rather curious.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: If you’re ever taking a WARP train, you may let me know, Manager. I will personally pick up your pieces.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: If it is actually that important to empathize with others… they should have stated as much in the company guidelines.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: W Corp. saw particularly many resignations. The quitting employees always had copious amounts of tears and saliva about their faces. I did not make an active effort to comprehend their behavior.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Do make sure to return in time.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Promotions… That, I am used to.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Understood, I’ll get you to your destination.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Onto our destination.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: You are certainly a peculiar individual.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Removing obstacles.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: I am not particularly amused.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Hmpfh!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: I won’t have to collect these remains.

dataList.desc: Ally Death
dataList.dlg: I’ll collect their remains later.

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: I merely followed the procedures.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: This was not in the procedures.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: The corpses here are more durable than what I work with.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: All of them have been segmented into adequate pieces.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: It’s a necessary step for familiarization.
